overview.en: POWER FANS is a blockchain platform developed on the basis of SEER – a public blockchain built on the Graphene toolkit. Serving the sports industry as a platform with its own ecosystem, POWER FANS provides online applications for different scenes in sports competition and offers various services to the audience including neutral and credible market-oriented prediction, sports betting and crowdfunding for competition.
overview.zh: POWER FANS是基于石墨烯公链SEER开发的区块链平台，通过运用区块链技术为体育比赛各场景提供线上应用，为观众提供中立且可信的现实预测市场服务，体育竞猜，比赛众筹等功能，是一个服务于体育圈生态下的生态平台。
